unnormalised: OMG, I love athlete bios! Just finished Milkha Singh's story again. Talk about dedication! Makes you wanna run like you're auditioning for a Dhyan Chand biopic. Reminds me of that scene from "Chak De! India." Seriously inspiring! Do you guys know if they've done one on P.V. Sindhu yet? Her journey from Hyderabad is unreal. So many kms travelled for that medal! Respect, truly!
normalised: Oh my God, I love athlete bios! Just finished Milkha Singh's story again. Talk about dedication! Makes you wanna run like you're auditioning for a Dhyan Chand biopic.
